articles.author: Raajwrita Dutta
articles.title: Asian Games 2023 Medal Tally Table: India Wins 13 Gold and 24 Silver Till Day 9 - The Quint
articles.description: The Asian Games 2023 medal tally table is updated here after Day 9 sports on Monday, 2 October. Go through the top countries and total number of medals won by India here.
articles.content:
• Kynan Chenai: Shooting, Mens trap - Bronze medal.
  • Nikhat Zareen: Boxing, Womens 50kg - Bronze medal.
  • Avinash Sable: Athletics, Mens 3000m steeplechase - Gold medal.
  • … [+1465 chars]

articles.author: TOI Sports Desk
articles.title: Hangzhou Asian Games: India's 4x400m mixed relay bronze turned into silver after Sri Lanka disqualified - Times of India
articles.description: Asian Games 2023 News: In another incident reminiscent of Jyothi Yarraji's silver medal upgrade at the Hangzhou Asian Games, India experienced a similar occurrence on Monday
articles.content:
Asian Games: Sable, Toor lead India's medal rush on Day 8
